00009 #ifndef __io_port_include__
00010 #define __io_port_include__
00011 
00018 class IO_Port {
00020   unsigned short address;
00021 public:
00022   IO_Port (unsigned short a) : address (a) {};
00023 
00029   void outb (unsigned char val) const {
00030         asm("outb %1, %0"
00031                 :
00032                 :"d"(address), "a"(val)
00033                 );
00034   };
00035 
00041   void outw (unsigned short val) const {
00042         asm("out %1, %0"
00043                 :
00044                 :"d"(address), "a"(val)
00045                 );
00046   };
00047 
00053   unsigned char inb () const {
00054         volatile unsigned char val=0;
00055     asm(
00056                 "in %0, %%al\t\n"
00057                 "mov %%al, (%1)"
00058                 :
00059                 :"d"(address), "r"(&val)
00060                 :"%al"
00061                 );
00062         return val;
00063   };
00064 
00070   unsigned short inw () const {
00071         volatile unsigned short val=0;
00072     asm(
00073                 "in %0, %%ax\t\n"
00074                 "mov %%ax, (%1)"
00075                 :
00076                 :"d"(address), "r"(&val)
00077                 :"%ax"
00078                 );
00079         return val;
00080   };
00081 };
00082 
00083 #endif
